resources.string: Welcome to Black Metal. Enter a title for your cover, then go ahead and click the button below to take it.
Swipe along to the Settings tab on the right to customise the look and grimness.
Hi, I\'m Barco. \n\nDid you know the original icon for this app was going to be a rather more stylized version of this?

Turns out watermarking really does work.

By the way, thanks for using this app! I hope it's as enjoyable to use as it was to make. Created over several months of weekends and after-work hours, I believe Black Metal is a one of a kind accessory for a commonly misunderstood culture. If you like the idea of creating and spreading black metal artwork (approximations) to the world, consider rating this app and sharing it with your friends.

I appreciate any comments or suggestions at my e-mail address: uxcedr@gmail.com

Thanks again,
Urgent X (Barco)
